text: WHLZ may refer to: * WHLZ-LD, a low-power television station (channel 21, virtual 19) licensed to serve Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, United States * WCKN, a radio station (92.5 FM) licensed to serve Moncks Corner, South Carolina, United States, which held the call sign WHLZ from 1986 to 2003 * WQPD, a radio station (100.5 FM) licensed to serve Marion, South Carolina, which held the call sign WHLZ from 2003 to 2017
title: WHLZ
